str2: From hos and pos; what(-ever) how, i.e. In the manner that (as adverb or conjunction of coincidence, intentional or actual).
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
Flesh, body, human nature, materiality; kindred.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To boast; I glory (exult) proudly. From some base akin to that of aucheo and euchomai; to vaunt.
Neuter of a compound of en and a derivative of optanomai; in the face of.
